projects.title: Clean Cycle
projects.description: Clean Cycle is a mobile application designed to address the pressing issue of environmental pollution and promote recycling to protect the environment. It serves as a platform for individuals and companies to actively participate in waste management efforts and contribute to a cleaner and more sustainable planet.

projects.title: Gemini Quizzify
projects.description: Gemini Quizzify is a chat interface using Streamlit that integrates with Google's Gemini large language model. It is an interactive platform that allows users to generate quizzes and practice questions based on the documents (notes) provided to the model.

projects.title: SeachMeUp
projects.description: A personal portfolio website that serves as a showcase for creative professionals to exhibit their work, skills, experience, and contact information. The website is designed to have distinct sections, including projects, skills, experience, and contact information.

projects.title: Mini-Survey Monkey
projects.description: A mini-survey monkey web application that allows a surveyor to create a survey with a list of questions. Users can answer either through text, number within a range, or multi-select format depending on the surveyor's design. Surveyors can close the survey whenever they want (thus not letting in new users to fill out the survey), and also generate the survery results. These results are either listed as-is, in form of a histogram, or a pie chart.
